title: US says Russia has added 7,000 troops along Ukraine border, despite claims of pullback
content:
1. US says Russia has added 7,000 troops along Ukraine border, despite claims of pullback  CNN
  2. State Department hits back at Russia 'propaganda,' says troops moving 'into fighting positions'  Fox News
  3. Is the Ukraine crisis ending? NATO doesn't think so  Reuters
  4. Russian army, Putin's favoured foreign policy tool  Yahoo News
  5. Russia says it's withdrawing troops from Ukraine border, what does it mean? - BBC News  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
US says Russia has added 7,000 troops along Ukraine border, despite claims of pullback  CNN
State Department hits back at Russia 'propaganda,' says troops moving 'into fighting positions'  Fox News
Is the Ukraine crisis ending? NATO doesn't think so  Reuters

localize.title: 米国は、ロシアがウクライナ国境沿いに7,000人の兵力を追加したと発表、撤退の主張にもかかわらず
美国称俄罗斯在乌克兰边境增兵7000人，尽管声称要撤军
美國稱俄羅斯在烏克蘭邊境增兵7000人，儘管聲稱要撤軍
